title: Aikatsu! Memorial Stage: Kagayaki no Unit Cup

alternative_titles.en: Aikatsu! Memorial Stage: Shining Unit Cup
alternative_titles.ja: アイカツ！メモリアルステージ ～輝きのユニットカップ～

synopsis:
It has been announced that the "Unit Cup" will be held at Starlight School's middle school.

The eight units selected to participate in the Unit Cup are raring with excitement. This time, there will also be a corner unique to the event where idols will report on each other's true selves behind the scenes.

The idols clash more passionately than ever!? Right here and now, the curtains rises on the Unit Cup! 

(Source: All Aikatsu! Wiki)
